messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] TCS People
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/28/2002 8:38:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I m not offended by the subject . . . I just think it s FUNNY. I also like reading the posts
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/28/2002 8:38:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
goddessofwisdom2@... writes:


> I agree with you, though, that the TCS thread is irritating, if not
> hysterically funny.>>>
>
> If you & Sandra don't want to read, there is a delete button.

I'm not offended by the subject . . . I just think it's FUNNY.

I also like reading the posts . . . irritating, funny, or no. However, if
you dislike the posts on this subject that bear my name as the author, I
would not mind in the slightest if they were deleted without review or
comment.

I think that the "TCS people" (which is what you called them, and which label
also bemused me) might very well be that previously unidentified group of
people to which Lynda referred not so very long ago. But, that's a whole
'nother subject . . .

Kate Davis, who is thinking about either offering to pay $10.00, in addition
to that offered by Sandra, to stop this thread, or taking Sandra up on the
offer, pocketing the $10.00, and declining to post anything further on this
subject (no matter how much she might like to)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
